records.title: Free Coffee
records.subtitle: Dark Horse Espresso
records.full_description: Get a free coffee as a small 'thank you' for all the good things you've done.  Valid at any of our Dark Horse Espresso locations in Toronto.
records.instructions: Your reward will be emailed to you shortly.

records.title: Domestic flight
records.subtitle: Air Canada
records.full_description: Get a free flight for all your hard work.
records.instructions: Your reward will be emailed to you shortly.

records.title: Donate $20
records.subtitle: Canada Helps
records.full_description: Use your points to make a donation to a CanadaHelps charity of your choice.
records.instructions: Instructions will be emailed to you.
